itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 20, 2013
description: German voters will go to the polls this weekend. What will happen to Germany's newest political party and its anti-euro message? The challenge of marketing to baby boomers. And with the launch of iPhone 5S on Friday, a look at the business of placeholders -- services that wait in line for you in exchange for a fee.
byline: Sam Beard, Cintra Wilson, Steve Gardner, Bruce Johnson, Shannon Mullen, David Weinberg, Mark Garrison and Gus Faucher
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 20, 2013
teaser: German voters will go to the polls this weekend. What will happen to Germany's newest political party and its anti-euro message? The challenge of marketing to baby boomers. And with the launch of iPhone 5S on Friday, a look at the business of placeholders -- services that wait in line for you in exchange for a fee.
